modules.description: Provides arithmetic operations for arbitrary-precision decimal numbers, including addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, and rounding. Works with a custom decimal type that represents numbers with user-defined precision and scale. Used for financial calculations, scientific computations, and any scenario requiring exact decimal representation.

Provides functions to parse and generate decimal literals from strings, supporting both integer and floating-point representations. Works with OCaml's parsetree expressions and location metadata to integrate decimal syntax into abstract syntax trees. Enables direct use of decimal notation like 1.1m in code, facilitating precise numeric input in compiled programs.
